mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_code empCode, e.team_code teamCode, t.team_name teamName, t.parent_team_code parentTeamCode, CASE WHEN t.parent_team_code = 10 THEN '' ELSE COALESCE(parentTeam.team_name, '') END AS parentTeamName, e.rank_code rankCode, CASE WHEN e.rank_code = 1 THEN '대표이사' WHEN e.rank_code = 2 THEN '부장' WHEN e.rank_code = 3 THEN '팀장' WHEN e.rank_code = 4 THEN '대리' WHEN e.rank_code = 5 THEN '사원' ELSE '' END AS rankName, e.emp_profile profile, e.emp_kor_name korName, CONCAT( SUBSTRING(e.emp_phone, 1, 3), '-', SUBSTRING(e.emp_phone, 4, 4), '-', SUBSTRING(e.emp_phone, 8) ) AS phone, e.emp_hire_date hireDate, e.final_modifier finalModifier FROM emp e JOIN team t ON e.team_code = t.team_code LEFT JOIN team parentTeam ON t.parent_team_code = parentTeam.team_code ORDER BY rankCode, teamCode, korName LIMIT ${startRow}, ${rowPerPage}

SELECT team_code teamCode, team_name teamName, team_des teamDes, parent_team_code parentTeamCode, team_create_date teamCreateDate, team_update_date teamUpdateDate FROM team WHERE team_code != 10 LIMIT ${startRow}, ${rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM team WHERE team_code != 10
SELECT team_code AS id, parent_team_code AS parentId, CASE WHEN team_name = 'GAEnt.' THEN '대표이사' ELSE team_name END AS name, team_des des FROM team ORDER BY team_code;
